Feb 6 (p)

I picked up the new Advantage album, Elf-Titled, and I like it a lot more than their first album. The do a rendition of the moon level from Ducktails which is awesome and they've also got the alien's lair from Contra and Kraid's lair from Metroid.

  • the advantage - 03 - metroid, kraids lair.mp3
  • the advantage - 04 - contra, aliens lair+boss.mp3

The Postal Service call out Apple and the directors of their recent ad on reproducing shots from the 'Such Great Heights' video. First the Lugz commercial and now this. Apple is ghetto.

Jan 10 (p)

Antiguo Autonoma Mexicano does chill electronic music out of Mexico and it is very good stuff. Check out this mix he did for a radio station in Barcelona. According to Static Discos, he should have a new album coming in '06.

Jan 5 (p)

Now, I don't read kottke, but....just kidding, his site is great. He posted a link to a Diplo mix of DJ Shadow's samples in his list of 2005 favorites which is some serious hot shit. Hearing the vocals for "Six Days" over Terror Squad's "Lean Back" made my day. Download it!
